澺字的基本解释

澺
yì
〔澺水〕中国河南省上蔡县以下洪河的古称。

澺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》於力切，入職，影。］
古水名。即今河南省上蔡县以下的洪河。源出河南省方城县之牛心山，至新蔡县与汝河会。

澺字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澺； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页654第01
【唐韻】於力切【集韻】乙力切，?音億。水名。【水經注】汝水，東南左會澺水。【說文】本作?。

澺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
澺字的起名意思

中国河南省上蔡县以下洪河的古称，如澺水。

Ming
Basic explanation of words
Ming
yì
〔澺水〕The ancient name of the Honghe River in Shangcai County, Henan Province, China.
Ming
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guang Yun" Yu Liqie, entry, film. ]
Ancient water name. This is Honghe below Shangcai County, Henan Province. Originated from Niuxin Mountain in Fangcheng County, Henan Province, to Xincai County and Ruhehui.
Ming
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　澺; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 654 No. 01
[Tang Yun] Yu Liqie 【Jiyun】Yi Liqie,? Yinyi billion. Water name. [Notes of Water Classics] Rushui, southeast of the left will meet Mingshui. [Said the text] This work?.

Ming
Name meaning
The ancient name for the Honghe River below Shangcai County, Henan Province, China, such as Yunshui.
